entry.title: Red in between the Lines
entry.summary:
Author: kimismiki

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,422Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 13

Summary: Peter operates on his own, working endlessly through his internship at a company that doesn't even respect his art‚Äî until he earns that respect, he works day in night in the fashion world of Gotham, and makes pieces, fixes pieces, and brainstorms pieces day and night, even causing him to have to stay overnights at the studio, on a dirty couch he bought second hand. As with everyone else, Peter isn't excused from having Trauma, and suffering from the fact that he has homophobic parents that blame him endless for his brothers death, his previous "not so job", a man from his past that continues to haunts his own narrative‚Äî and then theres Jason, who he meets at the Spot, inside of Peter's favorite cafe. Awkward glances, gawking, even blood, starts to beginning of a friendship that Peter endears‚Äî he is cracking his doors, letting someone in his life, while also trying to get even a small peak through his. Red in between the Lines deals with dark, mature, & explicit themes, that go hand and hand with trauma, politics, selfishness & selflesness, and more. Updated tags about certain themes will be added as the story progresses, with any necessary triggers being added before the chapter begins.

entry.title: Fear Gas
entry.summary:
Author: Ava_Mae

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,152Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 49

Summary: "I need you to come down to Robinson Park as soon as you possibly can." "To Robi- Robinson Park? The one Poison Ivy regularly hangs out in? What in the world are you doing in there, and how am I supposed to help?" "I mean, she's not here right now, it should be perfectly fine. Also it's a place that isn't making Jay more paranoid than he usually is, so we're kinda sticking around since it seems to calm him down." "What?? Nightwing, why the hell do you need to keep Jay calm?" "He got fear gassed earlier tonight." Oh for-- You quickly flung back the blanket and shot out of bed, immediately heading down the hall toward the kitchen in search of your work bag, keys, jacket, and shoes. "A word of advice for you-- lead with 'he's been fear gassed' first next time."

entry.title: Good Luck, Babe.
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,474Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 398

Summary: Born as the heir to a dirty fortune and nothing more, since you could walk you‚Äôve known you‚Äôd marry someone for the sake of carrying on your family‚Äôs legacy. Trying to find love was never forbidden‚Äïit was simply out of the question. There was no point in finding it when you were betrothed to a complete stranger. As the prized and only daughter of Roman Sionis, otherwise known as the infamous crime lord Black Mask, what choice was there to make?Mafia boss Bruce Wayne strikes a deal with your father‚Äïjoin your two incredibly powerful and wealthy families by marrying off the soul heirs. That would be you, and Bruce Wayne‚Äôs adopted ‚Äògolden son,‚Äô Richard Grayson.The first time you meet Dick, he‚Äôs nothing short of a typical rich kid. Polite in all the ways that mattered, a little arrogant and a little flashy for your taste, but cute nonetheless. But when you meet Dick‚Äôs bodyguard, Jason Todd‚Äïa reformed criminal paying off his debt to the Wayne‚Äôs‚Äïeverything changes. Jason is handsome, aloof, dangerous, everything you aren‚Äôt allowed to have.And now, he‚Äôs suddenly everything you want.

entry.title: The Black Widow of Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: TheMostUniqueName20

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,436Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 30

Summary: When y/n was 11 years old, she was enrolled at Gotham Academy under a false identity, placed by her Red Room handlers as a part of an early infiltration assignment. "Find out more about the Wayne family, get close to them, and take them out." But what happens when you get too close to the supposed enemy? What happens when you form genuine connections? What happens when you feel like a kid again? Forgetting you're supposed to hurt the Waynes, not be one? Well, the Red Room will step in and cut you out and start your training from scratch again, all while leaving those who now have a connection with you wondering where you are, where it went wrong, if you're okay.... Eventually, they accept your disappearance until you've eventually become a faded memory to them. ¬† Until... 8 years later..... ¬† (Use of y/n for right now will be replaced with "___", sorry for bad summary üòÖ)

entry.title: THE SPIDER (Yandere! Batfam x reader)
entry.summary:
Author: mavimoon

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,199Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 308

Summary: Gotham is a city that devours color. [Name] knows this better than anyone. Now, thrust into the gilded cage of Wayne Manor, she finds herself a stranger among fractured souls: a father who won‚Äôt meet her eyes, brothers who guard their wounds like weapons, and a butler whose kindness feels like the last candle in a storm. But Gotham‚Äôs gray is a lie, cause beneath its concrete skin, something pulses, a spectrum only she can see. The Bat may own the night, but [Name] carries her mother‚Äôs defiance in her veins: where they carve shadows, she will paint fire.

entry.summary:
Author: Neriumssmut

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,773Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 19

Summary: Jason Todd hears rumors that The Scarecrow has been metaling with a new fear formula that would be able to tap into a person's dream physically. Changing it into whatever he wants and also being able to keep them there in his own personal nightmare playground. Jason knows Batman will only try and take him into custody again once he hears of it and he's had enough of the back and forth with the same villains. Scarecrow wants nothing but death and suffering and that's exactly what he's gonna get.Ayla Rivens, otherwise known as Dusk, a survivor turned avenger, Dusk is a ruthless, dream-walking vigilante with a personal vendetta against Scarecrow. Her powers make her a formidable force, but her methods are as dark as the nightmares she controls.

entry.title: and still, i came back (to you)
entry.summary:
Author: xyluem

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,625Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 36

Summary: You were never the type to dislike change. You didn‚Äôt complain when your family moved to Metropolis for your parents‚Äô new jobs when you were ten. You didn‚Äôt panic when one of your drone test runs accidentally trapped Superman of all people. You didn‚Äôt even flinch when he offered you a smile, curious rather than angry, offering something that sounded suspiciously like a partnership. You adapted. You learned. You thrived. To you, becoming Superman‚Äôs sidekick was just another challenge to figure out. One moment you were tinkering in your garage; the next, you were upgrading the security systems and arguing with Justice League AI systems that didn‚Äôt understand sarcasm. You were fine with all of it.You were fine with everything. Until the day you were sent back to Gotham. Back to the city that never truly forgot you. Back to the shadows you‚Äôd unknowingly left behind‚Äîand the damage you never realized you caused. Because Gotham remembers. And the ghosts here don‚Äôt stay buried. (mostly jason todd/reader and tim drake/reader, but has slightly yj member including superboy, wonder girl, and impulse/reader)

Author: ElaineInABox

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,156Chapters: 5/15Kudos: 165

Summary: You weren‚Äôt looking for love, just somewhere cheap, quiet, and safe enough to get you through the semester. Jason Todd wasn‚Äôt looking for company, just a roommate who wouldn‚Äôt ask questions about why he came home at two AM bloody and bruised.But in a cramped apartment in Crime Alley, between burnt coffee, leaky ceilings, and the soft hum of the city that never sleeps, the silence between you starts to change. entry.title: Haunted by the Thought of You
entry.summary:
Author: BoggieBoat

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,715Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Ghosts aren't real. Every story ever told about one is just clearly made up just to get a rise out of anyone who would listen to such an idiotic tale- especially the one currently circling throughout Gotham Academy. After all, why would a murderous, vengeful spirit of a teacher possibly haunt a school for the rest of eternity and claim students' lives for something that happened generations ago? And, no, Damian Wayne is not scared- he's a trained assassin and fights crime with Batman almost every night! Why would an old urban legend possibly ruffle the Robins' feathers? Even the teacher he told the story to thought that it was ridiculous!Why he is the only person who's able to see them is irrelevant. Don't ask.
